Open Pet Food Facts is a database of more than %1$s pet food products (plus the ones you will contribute) Woof. Woof.
Open Pet Food Facts是一个宠物食品数据库，包含了宠物食品的成分、营养成分、营养事实… 汪汪。汪汪。
为宠物食品的透明度做贡献
扫描产品，拍照，让宠物食品透明化
获取信息
为您解密关于所扫描产品的大量信息
记录您使用的产品
你扫描的所有宠物食品，在一个方便的列表中，你可以导出所有的宠物食品
离线工作
即使您目前没有互联网连接，也可以添加新的产品。
您扫描的产品还不存在于Open Pet Food Facts。请添加它。
您扫描的产品已经存在于Open Pet Food Facts。
在 Open Food Facts 中查看这个产品：
图书目前未被 Open Food Facts 支持
- 扩大您的搜索 \n- 扫描并将其添加到 Open Food Facts
点击此处捐助给 Open Food Facts
帮助翻译 Open Food Facts
将 Open Food Facts 数据库带到您的语言 - 没有技术性的知识要求
Scan the products even when you are offline so as to add them to Open Pet Food Facts later. The scanned products will appear here and you will be able to send them using the button below.

Your allergies info will never be sent to the Open Food Facts server. Also, be careful that product data may not be accurate, and detection might not be 100% accurate, so please double-check by yourself!
Open Pet Food Facts Android App
free pet food products database
The product %1$s you scanned does not exist yet in Open Pet Food Facts. Can you add it?
Currently on Open Pet Food Facts
帮助分类产品
Add nutrition facts to compute nutrient levels
添加类别以帮助完成产品
Add a category and nutrition facts to help complete the product
我的产品
Products to buy
Add to Open Pet Food Facts

You\'ll be able to add product to this list by scanning products, dragging the product card up and tapping on \"Products to buy\". You\'ll also be able to add products to this list by searching them and clicking on the + button in the top right of the product page.
Open Pet Food Facts logo
Examples: Purina, Whiskas, etc…
